name: Crypto Halal :)
description:
XLM is a cryptocurrency which operates on the Stellar software technology which was launched in 2014. The main vision of the Stellar platform is to be a cross-border or cross-border payment solution that eliminates middlemen（it promises the ability to complete very short transactions、 which is only 5 seconds。 This is faster than Ethereum which takes 3.5 minutes).

For investors and crypto traders who want halal products, Stellar has added value. This crypto asset was certified halal on 17 July 2018 from the Bahrain-based Shariyah Review Bureau (SRB).
